title: Dark of Night
description: It now followed her to Whitesands. Everyone who took part in it with her had died horribly. There was no escaping it. It would get her too. Who could save Jane from the inevitable? Sheriff Jake, the sheriff of Whitesands, a former inspector of Scotland Yard and world renowned detective, now faced his greatest ever challenge. With the help of his best friend and deputy, Chief, these brothers-in-arms will be tried and tested like never before. The tragedies that ensue will darken the days of Whitesands. It lurks in the shadows to bring destruction to those brave enough - or foolish enough, to try and stop it. It will not be denied.
author: Marios Savva
